div.p:
Online user 1:
How am I supposed to have a good time? Three beers and out? No way.

Online user 2:
Hmm, I know a lot of people who drink way more than those guidelines.

Online user 3:
Umm.. I don't think those guidelines are meant for people like me, who like to have a good time, you can't have any fun.

Online user 4:
I drink more than that and I feel fine. I'm kinda surprised.
